name: Ktacomb
description:
Ktacomb places you in the boots of an explorer of the forbidden Catacombs of Paris. However, during your trip, your headlight broke down! Will you be able to find your way to the ladder?

Warning : a headset is recommended to play the game, and audio is required to be able to beat the game!

On this project, I was the lead Game and Level Designer, and https://naboroo.itch.io/ was the lead artist. You can also find the game on his profile!
